title: Reflections on a co-location experience: From IRCC to CDS
description: I originally heard about CDS from my manager at IRCC, and, before you knew it, I was stalking their [GitHub repositories](https://github.com/cds-snc) and learning about a front-end library called [React](https://reactjs.org/). I was excited to get out of my silo and collaborate in what seemed to be an environment working with newer technologies.
